name: Evil Mind
desc:
If you control a Fiend monster: Activate 1 of these effects, depending on the number of monsters in your opponent's GY.
●1 or more: Draw a card.
●4 or more: Add 1 "HERO" monster or "Dark Fusion" from your Deck to your hand.
●10 or more: Add 1 "Polymerization" or "Fusion" Spell from your Deck to your hand.
You can only activate 1 "Evil Mind" per turn.
str2: Add 1 "HERO" monster or 1 "Dark Fusion" from your Deck to your hand
str3: Add 1 "Polymerization" Spell or "Fusion" Spell from your Deck to your hand
